knowledge_graph.config_saved: Configuration saved! It will be automatically loaded when the application starts next time.
knowledge_graph.no_connection: Not connected to database. Please configure and connect to the database first.
knowledge_graph.invalid_config: Invalid configuration. Please check database connection settings.
knowledge_graph.vector_dimension_updated:
Vector dimension configuration updated to 1024 dimensions!

Important Notice:
Due to the use of global connection pool (OnceCell), configuration changes require an application restart to take effect.

Please:
1. Close the application
2. Restart the application
3. Configuration will take effect automatically

New configuration:
- Embedding dimension: 1024
- Similarity algorithm: cosine
knowledge_graph.validation_found_invalid: Validation completed! Found {{invalidCount}} invalid items. These items will be skipped during import, processing valid data will continue.
knowledge_graph.validation_all_valid: Validation successful! All {{validCount}} items are correctly formatted.
knowledge_graph.vector_dimension_mismatch:
Vector index rebuild completed, but dimension mismatch detected!

{{result}}

Detected usage of old 1536-dimension configuration.
Recommendation:
1. Click the \"Fix Dimension Configuration\" button
2. Restart the application
3. Rebuild the vector index again

This ensures the vector index matches your embedding model dimensions.
knowledge_graph.bulk_import_completed:
Bulk import completed!

Successfully imported: {{successCount}} items
Failed and skipped: {{failedCount}} items

{{errorDetails}}

dashboard.api_success: API call successful, check console logs

siliconflow.enter_api_key_first: Please enter SiliconFlow API key first
siliconflow.network_error: Network error, please check network connection
siliconflow.models_fetched_success: Successfully fetched {{count}} SiliconFlow models (including chat, embedding, reranker models)
siliconflow.fetch_models_error: Failed to fetch SiliconFlow model list:
siliconflow.section_description: Enter API key, select model, create configuration with one click
siliconflow.api_key_auto_save: Enter your SiliconFlow API key (will be auto-saved)
siliconflow.instruction_1: 1. Enter your SiliconFlow API key (will be auto-saved locally, no need to re-enter)
siliconflow.instruction_2: 2. Click 'Get Model List' button to fetch available models
siliconflow.instruction_3: 3. Select the model you need from the dropdown (supports chat, embedding, reranker models)
siliconflow.instruction_4: 4. Click 'Create API Configuration' button to complete setup
siliconflow.instruction_5: 5. System will automatically set multimodal, reasoning, embedding, reranker tags based on model features
siliconflow.instruction_6: 6. After creating configuration, you can continue selecting other models without re-fetching the model list
siliconflow.instruction_7: 7. To change API key, click the clear button on the right side of the input field
siliconflow.instruction_8: 8. Embedding models (like BAAI/bge-m3) are suitable for knowledge base construction
siliconflow.instruction_9: 9. Reranker models (like BAAI/bge-reranker-v2-m3) are suitable for search result optimization
siliconflow.no_available_models: No models with 'available' status found, but all models have been retrieved

anki.system_prompt_default:
You are a professional Anki learning card creation assistant. Please generate high-quality Anki learning cards based on the provided learning content.

Requirements:
1. Cards should aid memory and understanding
2. Questions should be concise and clear
3. Answers should be accurate and complete
4. Add relevant tags appropriately
5. Ensure logical and practical cards
anki.custom_requirements_help: Tip: Detailed requirements help AI generate cards that better meet your needs. For example:
anki.custom_requirements_example: Please focus on creating concept definition cards, each containing practical application scenarios

mcp_tools.title: MCP å·¥å…·

anki.template_usage_minimal: Suitable for quick memorization and concept review
anki.template_usage_academic: Suitable for academic learning and professional terminology
anki.template_usage_code: Suitable for programming learning and code practice
anki.template_usage_cloze: Suitable for active recall and keyword memorization
anki.template_usage_choice: Suitable for comprehension testing and choice judgment

api_recovery.config_lost_message: Your API configuration data has been lost and needs to be reconfigured.
api_recovery.restore_templates_intro: We can restore common default configuration templates for you:
api_recovery.recovery_warning: After recovery, you need to fill in your own API keys and enable corresponding configurations
api_recovery.step_2: Go to settings page to fill in your API keys
api_recovery.step_3: Enable API configurations you need to use
api_recovery.step_4: Set up function-model assignments in model assignment page

card_manager.fill_tag_info: Please fill in tag name and type
card_manager.suggestion_alert: Tip: You can use the \"Problem Card Management\" feature to organize and track learning progress

review_dashboard.title: Unified Review Analysis
review_dashboard.description: Perform unified in-depth analysis of multiple mistakes, discover learning patterns, and develop improvement plans
review_dashboard.search_placeholder: Search review analysis name or questions...
review_dashboard.first_analysis_description: Create review analysis to deeply analyze multiple mistakes, discover learning patterns, and develop improvement plans
review_dashboard.adjust_filters: Try adjusting filter conditions or search keywords
review_dashboard.delete_not_exist: Review analysis does not exist or has been deleted

gemini_adapter_test.title: Gemini Adapter Test
gemini_adapter_test.description: This test page verifies whether gemini_adapter.rs can correctly convert OpenAI compatible format to Gemini API calls and work properly
gemini_adapter_test.test_prompt_default: Hello, please briefly introduce yourself in Chinese. This is a test of the Gemini adapter's OpenAI compatible interface conversion functionality.
gemini_adapter_test.connection_success: Connection successful! API key and endpoint are valid.
gemini_adapter_test.basic_connection_test_desc: Basic connection test - Verify API key and endpoint validity
gemini_adapter_test.non_streaming_test_success: Gemini adapter non-streaming test successful! OpenAI format has been correctly converted to Gemini API calls.
gemini_adapter_test.non_streaming_test_desc: Non-streaming OpenAI compatible interface test - Using streaming interface to collect complete response
gemini_adapter_test.non_streaming_test_exception_desc: Non-streaming OpenAI compatible interface test - Exception failure
gemini_adapter_test.send_non_streaming_request: Sending non-streaming test request (using streaming interface), using adapter
gemini_adapter_test.streaming_test_success: Gemini adapter streaming test successful! OpenAI format has been correctly converted to Gemini streaming API calls.
gemini_adapter_test.streaming_test_desc: Streaming OpenAI compatible interface test - Verify OpenAI streaming format conversion to Gemini streaming API calls
gemini_adapter_test.streaming_test_failed_desc: Streaming OpenAI compatible interface test - Failed
gemini_adapter_test.streaming_test_exception_desc: Streaming OpenAI compatible interface test - Exception failure
gemini_adapter_test.send_streaming_request: Sending streaming test request, using adapter
gemini_adapter_test.upload_image_first: Please upload an image first for testing.
gemini_adapter_test.model_not_multimodal: Current model does not support multimodal functionality.
gemini_adapter_test.send_multimodal_request: Sending multimodal test request, using adapter
gemini_adapter_test.multimodal_prompt: Please describe the content of this image. Test Gemini adapter's multimodal OpenAI compatible interface conversion.
gemini_adapter_test.multimodal_test_success: Gemini adapter multimodal test successful! OpenAI multimodal format has been correctly converted to Gemini API calls.
gemini_adapter_test.multimodal_test_desc: Multimodal OpenAI compatible interface test - Verify OpenAI multimodal format conversion to Gemini multimodal API calls
gemini_adapter_test.config_requirements_desc: Please first add a Google (Gemini) adapter configuration in API settings, then enable that configuration.
gemini_adapter_test.model_adapter_requirement: modelAdapter field must be set to
gemini_adapter_test.enabled_requirement: Configuration must be in enabled state
gemini_adapter_test.basic_connection_desc: Verify API key and endpoint validity
gemini_adapter_test.multimodal_desc: Verify image+text OpenAI multimodal format conversion

settings.title: Settings
settings.api_config_in_use: This API configuration is in use and cannot be deleted
settings.confirm_delete_api: Are you sure you want to delete this API configuration?

model_assignment_section.title: Model Assignment
model_assignment_section.description: Assign appropriate models for various AI functions in the system. Different functions (such as OCR recognition, problem solving, review analysis, Anki card creation, knowledge base embedding, summary generation, etc.) may require different types or capabilities of models for optimal results. Please allocate reasonably based on your API configuration and needs.
model_assignment_section.model2_desc: Used for problem solving and dialogue interaction, any type of model can be selected
model_assignment_section.model2_save_failed: Failed to save second model configuration: {{error}}
model_assignment_section.anki_desc: Used for generating Anki memory cards, recommend selecting models with strong text generation capabilities
model_assignment_section.anki_save_failed: Failed to save Anki card model configuration: {{error}}
model_assignment_section.embedding_desc: Used to convert documents into vector embeddings, supports RAG knowledge base retrieval functionality
model_assignment_section.embedding_save_failed: Failed to save embedding model configuration: {{error}}
model_assignment_section.reranker_desc: Used to rerank RAG retrieval results, improve relevance (optional configuration)
model_assignment_section.reranker_save_failed: Failed to save reranker model configuration: {{error}}
model_assignment_section.summary_desc: Specifically used for generating mistake summaries, recommend using models with strong understanding and summarization capabilities. If not selected, will use \"Second Model (Answer + Dialogue)\".
model_assignment_section.summary_placeholder: Please select model (default uses second model)...
model_assignment_section.summary_save_failed: Failed to save summary generation model configuration: {{error}}
model_assignment_section.basic_complete: Basic functionality configuration complete, you can start using mistake analysis features!
model_assignment_section.advanced_complete: Advanced functionality configuration complete, you can use mistake analysis and review analysis features!
model_assignment_section.all_complete: All functionality configuration complete, you can use mistake analysis, review analysis, and Anki card creation features!

general_settings_section.title: General Settings
general_settings_section.auto_save_desc: When enabled, configuration changes will be automatically saved without needing to manually click the save button
general_settings_section.rag_settings_desc: Configure global settings for Retrieval Augmented Generation (RAG) functionality
general_settings_section.rag_enable_desc: When enabled, AI analysis will be able to utilize your uploaded knowledge base documents to provide more accurate answers
general_settings_section.top_k_desc: Number of relevant documents retrieved from knowledge base per query, recommended setting 3-10
general_settings_section.rag_no_embedding: RAG functionality is enabled but no embedding model is configured. Please configure embedding model in the \"Model Assignment\" tab.
general_settings_section.anki_connect_desc: When enabled, Anki card creation page will show AnkiConnect related features, allowing direct import of cards to Anki application.
general_settings_section.gemini_test_desc: When enabled, \"Gemini Adapter Test\" option will appear in the sidebar. This feature is used for testing and debugging Gemini API adapter.

api_edit_modal.model_name_desc: Please enter the accurate model name, this will be used for API calls
api_edit_modal.multimodal_desc: Check this to indicate the model supports image input (e.g. GPT-4V, Claude-3, etc.)
api_edit_modal.reasoning_desc: Check this to indicate the model supports reasoning functionality
api_edit_modal.embedding_desc: Check this to indicate the model is used for generating vector embeddings (e.g. text-embedding-ada-002, bge-m3, etc.)
api_edit_modal.reranker_desc: Check this to indicate the model is used for search result reranking (e.g. bge-reranker-v2-m3, etc.)

adapter_options.general_desc: Suitable for most standard AI models
adapter_options.google_desc: Google Gemini series models, supports multimodal and high-quality text generation
